Release History
===============

0.1.1 (2018-11-28)
-------------------

- Bugfixes
- support for python 3.x and linux.
- Added command line.

0.1.0 (2018-05-12)
------------------

- Release on pipy!
- Support RSA+PSS.
- Support for python 3.5.

0.0.9 (2017-09-27)
------------------

- Support Apk signature v2.
- Support ECDSA.


Alpha (2014-10-27)
------------------

- Birth!
- Support Apk signature v1 with RSA/DSA.
